metadata.title: CVE-2024-43886 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Add null check in resource_log_pipe_topology_update[WHY]When switching from "Extend" to "Second Display Only" we sometimescall resource_get_otg_master_for_stream on a stream for the eDP,which is disconnected. This leads to a null pointer dereference.[HOW]Added a null check in dc_resource.c/resource_log_pipe_topology_update.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
